 CITY SECRETARY

CITY SECRETARY
--------------

**City Secretary**  
**The** **Position****of City** **Secretary is a statutory position required by State Law.**The City Secretary serves as Custodian of the City Corporate Seal, attests the Mayor's Signature on all official documents.    
For Open Records request please contact the City Secretary at: 210-667-9568  
or email at **[cityhall@sainthedwigcity.com](mailto:cityhall@sainthedwigcity.com)  
  
Saint Hedwig City Secretary  
Janice Staudt**
